Name: SYS_TIMESTAMP
Label: Uptime
Description: Number of seconds since device power up

Name: SYS_REGMAP_VERSION
Label: Register map version
Description:
Version of register map in format 0xAAAABBBB:
AAAA - major part
BBBB - minor part

Name: SYS_VDDA_REF
Label: Analog supply
Description: Measured analog reference voltage

Name: SYS_SUPPLY_VOLTAGE
Label: Power voltage
Description: Measured power supply voltage

Name: SYS_TEST
Label: Test register
Description: Internal testing purpose

Name: SYS_STATUS
Label: Status register
Description:
Binary map of different status flags
Meaning of respective bits: 
Bit 0 - Generic error - Any error flag.
Bit 16 - Configuration flash error - Error when working with configuration memory.
Bit 17 - Low voltage - Detected low power supply voltage.
Bit 18 - Modbus timeout - No modbus communication for timeout period.
Bit 19 - Testing mode - Testing mode is enabled.

Name: SYS_COMMAND
Label: Command
Description:
Following commands are supported:
Value 9901 - Reset
Value 8801 - Factory reset
Value 7701 - Testing mode
Value 66xx - Invoke error
Value 5501 - Invoke watchdog reset

Name: SYS_IO_INPUT
Label: Input signals
Description:
Set of input signals. 
Bits 0-4 - Modbus address offset
Bits 5-8 - Bootstrap
Bit 9 - Pushbutton

Name: SYS_TICK
Label: Tick
Description: Internal millisecond tick

Name: FACT_SERIAL_NUMBER
Label: Serial number
Description:
Serial number of product with common device ID in format XXYYZZZZ.
XX - year of production
YY - month of production
ZZZZ - serial incremental number of the product

Name: FACT_DEVICE_ID
Label: Product number
Description: Product family identification. Constant value 2050 for all instances.

Name: FACT_HW_REVISION
Label: Hardware version
Description:
Hardware revision of the device defined as 0xAAAABBBB:
AAAA - major part
BBBB - minor part

Name: FACT_BOOT_REVISION
Label: Bootloader version
Description:
Firmware revision of the bootloader as number 0xAAAABBBB:
AAAA - major version
BBBB - minor version

Name: FIRM_REVISION
Label: Firmware version
Description: Firmware revision of the current application image as an incremental number. See list of FW revision or release notes for respective features.

Name: FIRM_ASSEMBLY_INFO
Label: Assembly date
Description:
Assembly information of the current application in format XXXXYYZZ:
XXXX - year of FW build
YY - month of FW build
ZZ - day of FW build

Name: FIRM_APP_CHECKSUM
Label: CRC checksum
Description: CRC checksum of the current application

Name: FIRM_APP_SIZE
Label: Firmware size
Description: Firmware size of the current application in bytes

Name: COM_MB_BAUD_RATE
Label: Modbus baud rate
Description:
Modbus RTU serial port baud rate
Allowed values: 
Value 0 - 9600 - 9600 baud/s.
Value 1 - 19200 - 19200 baud/s.
Value 2 - 38400 - 38400 baud/s.
Value 3 - 57600 - 57600 baud/s.
Value 4 - 115200 - 115200 baud/s.

Name: COM_MB_PARITY
Label: Modbus parity
Description:
Modbus RTU serial port parity
Allowed values: 
Value 0 - NONE - NONE parity.
Value 1 - EVEN - EVEN parity.
Value 2 - ODD - ODD parity.

Name: COM_MB_STOP_BITS
Label: Modbus stop bits
Description:
Modbus RTU serial port - number of stop bits
Allowed values: 
Value 0 - 1 stop bit - 1 stop bit.
Value 1 - 2 stop bits - 2 stop bits.

Name: COM_MB_APPLY
Label: Apply modbus parameters
Description:
Apply new modbus communication parameters.
Value 1 - Apply new settings

Name: COM_MB_TIMEOUT
Label: Modbus timeout
Description:
Longer silent period implies connection lost.
Zero value disables timeout indication.

Name: DBG_WRITES_CONF
Label: Configuration writes
Description:
Number of writes into internal configuration flash.
Assuming flash size 4kB, entry size 128 B, minimal total endurance is 10000 * 4096 / 128 = 320000

Name: CALIB_MODE
Label: Calibration mode
Description: Writing 1111 stores the current calibration into one-time programmable memory

Name: CALIB_RESERVED
Label: Reserved
Description: Reserved for future use

Name: PH_ENABLE
Label: Enable detection
Description:
Enable phase detection and measuring.
Allowed values: 
Value 0 - Disable - Phase detector does not evaluate state of Lines.
Value 1 - Enable - Phase detector detects all Line wires and evaluate zero crossing and time measurement.

Name: PH_CLEAR_ALL
Label: Clear all counters
Description:
Clear all counters and measured times at once.
Allowed values: 
Value 0 - None - Do nothing with counters.
Value 1 - Clear all - Clear all counters.

Name: PH_STATE
Label: Current state of Lines
Description:
State of phase detection on respective power Lines
Meaning of respective bits: 
Bit 0 - Line 1 - L1 is live.
Bit 1 - Line 2 - L2 is live.
Bit 2 - Line 3 - L3 is live.
Bit 3 - Line 4 - L4 is live.
Bit 4 - Line 5 - L5 is live.
Bit 5 - Line 6 - L6 is live.

Name: PH_TOLERANCE
Label: Tolerance
Description: Tolerance of ON and OFF state duration measurement. This tolerance does not affect Counters 1-6

Name: PH_COUNTER_1
Label: Counter L1
Description: Count of zero-crossing events detected at Line 1

Name: PH_COUNTER_2
Label: Counter L2
Description: Count of zero-crossing events detected at Line 2

Name: PH_COUNTER_3
Label: Counter L3
Description: Count of zero-crossing events detected at Line 3

Name: PH_COUNTER_4
Label: Counter L4
Description: Count of zero-crossing events detected at Line 4

Name: PH_COUNTER_5
Label: Counter L5
Description: Count of zero-crossing events detected at Line 5

Name: PH_COUNTER_6
Label: Counter L6
Description: Count of zero-crossing events detected at Line 6

Name: PH_TIME_CURRENT_1
Label: Duration on L1
Description: Time duration of current detected state at Line 1

Name: PH_TIME_CURRENT_2
Label: Duration on L2
Description: Time duration of current detected state at Line 2

Name: PH_TIME_CURRENT_3
Label: Duration on L3
Description: Time duration of current detected state at Line 3

Name: PH_TIME_CURRENT_4
Label: Duration on L4
Description: Time duration of current detected state at Line 4

Name: PH_TIME_CURRENT_5
Label: Duration on L5
Description: Time duration of current detected state at Line 5

Name: PH_TIME_CURRENT_6
Label: Duration on L6
Description: Time duration of current detected state at Line 6

Name: PH_TIME_ON_1
Label: Last ON time L1
Description: Time duration of the most recent ON state at Line 1

Name: PH_TIME_ON_2
Label: Last ON time L2
Description: Time duration of the most recent ON state at Line 2

Name: PH_TIME_ON_3
Label: Last ON time L3
Description: Time duration of the most recent ON state at Line 3

Name: PH_TIME_ON_4
Label: Last ON time L4
Description: Time duration of the most recent ON state at Line 4

Name: PH_TIME_ON_5
Label: Last ON time L5
Description: Time duration of the most recent ON state at Line 5

Name: PH_TIME_ON_6
Label: Last ON time L6
Description: Time duration of the most recent ON state at Line 6

Name: PH_TIME_OFF_1
Label: Last OFF time L1
Description: Time duration of the most recent OFF state at Line 1

Name: PH_TIME_OFF_2
Label: Last OFF time L2
Description: Time duration of the most recent OFF state at Line 2

Name: PH_TIME_OFF_3
Label: Last OFF time L3
Description: Time duration of the most recent OFF state at Line 3

Name: PH_TIME_OFF_4
Label: Last OFF time L4
Description: Time duration of the most recent OFF state at Line 4

Name: PH_TIME_OFF_5
Label: Last OFF time L5
Description: Time duration of the most recent OFF state at Line 5

Name: PH_TIME_OFF_6
Label: Last OFF time L6
Description: Time duration of the most recent OFF state at Line 6
